#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb push_back
using namespace std;
int prime[100005];
vector<int> fac[100005];
vector<int> ps(100005,1);
inline void sieve() {
    prime[0]=1;
    prime[1]=1;
    for(int i=2;i<=100005;i++) {
        if(!prime[i])  {
            ps[i]=i;
            for(int j=2*i;j<=100005;j+=i) {
                prime[j]=1;
                ps[j]*=i;
            }
        }
    }
}
struct triple {
    int x,y,z;
};
bool cmp(struct triple a,struct triple b) {
    return a.x<b.x;
}
int main() {
    sieve();
    vector<pair<int,int> >q;
    int j=1;
    while(j<=100000) {
        q.push_back(make_pair(ps[j],j));
        j++;
    }
    sort(q.begin(),q.end());
    int t;cin>>t;
    while(t--) {
        int n,k;
        cin>>n>>k;
        int cnt=0;
        int i;
        for(i=0;i<=100000;i++)
        {
                if(q[i].second<=n) {
                    cnt++;
                }
                if(cnt==k) {
                    break;
                }
        }
        cout<<q[i].second<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
